parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned when registration is successful

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to call API. Apply for access and inquire in future.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop.

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Unique authentication key for each request

response_fields.name: warning
response_fields.description: If some data cannot respond normally, tell the warning

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: request id value for each request

error_codes.description: The authorization key expired is not found

notes: The documentation shows both request and response parameters, along with error codes and API permissions. The endpoint appears to be for retrieving product level campaign information.
